content: The whip-wielding warrior will offer some interesting insight about the Black Wind King that rules over this mountain, and the greed and lies that have infected him and his people. While you’re here, you can interact with a small pillow in the middle of the cave to rest at a new **Meditation Spot** in front of the altar, granting you a new Skill Point.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Bamboo_Grove_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Bamboo Grove Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Back Hills'.
The content is as follows:
The whip-wielding warrior will offer some interesting insight about the Black Wind King that rules over this mountain, and the greed and lies that have infected him and his people. While you’re here, you can interact with a small pillow in the middle of the cave to rest at a new **Meditation Spot** in front of the altar, granting you a new Skill Point.
